alert.note: Alert for Fleming (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 02 at 2:26PM EST until March 03 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM EST FRIDAY THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of east central Kentucky, including the following county, Fleming. * WHEN...From 1 AM EST Friday through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and some thunderstorms producing moderate to heavy rain will overspread the area overnight and likely persist through Friday. Rainfall totals of 1 to 2 inches, with locally higher amounts possible.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
